rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with eco-friendly materials and Vastu-compliant layout. The entrance hall is located in the east to invite positivity.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open-concept living room integrated with indoor plants and natural ventilation, facing north-east for abundance.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern eco-friendly kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, located in the south-east to maintain balance as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for family gatherings, designed with sustainable materials and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: A quiet space for work or study, positioned in the north-west direction to enhance concentration.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest bedroom with eco-friendly decor and natural light, located on the west side ensuring privacy.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Small utility room for household storage and laundry, positioned near the kitchen for convenience.

openings.location: East-facing entrance door with natural stone flooring to maintain Vastu alignment.

openings.description: Large, energy-efficient windows across all rooms to maximize natural lighting and cross ventilation.
